name: Action
description: Action games are fast-paced and usually involve a lot of shooting.

games.title: Call of Duty
games.description: Call of Duty is a first-person shooter video game franchise published by Activision.

games.title: Gears of War
games.description: Gears of War is a third-person shooter video game franchise created by Epic Games and owned by Microsoft Studios.

name: RPG
description: Role-playing games are games in which players assume the roles of characters in a fictional setting.

games.title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
games.description: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim is an action role-playing video game developed by Bethesda Game Studios and published by Bethesda Softworks.

games.title: Final Fantasy VII
games.description: Final Fantasy VII is a role-playing video game developed by Square for the PlayStation console.

name: Strategy
description: Strategy games are games in which the players' in-game decisions have a high impact on the outcome of the game.

games.title: Age of Empires
games.description: Age of Empires is a series of historical real-time strategy video games, originally developed by Ensemble Studios and published by Microsoft.

games.title: StarCraft
games.description: StarCraft is a military science fiction media franchise created by Chris Metzen and James Phinney and owned by Blizzard Entertainment.

name: Sports
description: Sports games are video games that simulate the practice of sports.

games.title: FIFA 21
games.description: FIFA 21 is a football simulation video game published by Electronic Arts as part of the FIFA series.

games.title: NBA 2K21
games.description: NBA 2K21 is a basketball simulation video game developed by Visual Concepts and published by 2K Sports, based on the National Basketball Association.

name: Adventure
description: Adventure games are games in which players assume the role of a protagonist in an interactive story driven by exploration and puzzle-solving.

games.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.description: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild is an action-adventure game developed and published by Nintendo.

games.title: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End
games.description: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End is an action-adventure game developed by Naughty Dog and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment.

name: Racing
description: Racing games are video games in which the player partakes in a racing competition with any type of land, air, or sea vehicles.

games.title: Forza Horizon 4
games.description: Forza Horizon 4 is a 2018 racing video game developed by Playground Games and published by Microsoft Studios for Xbox One and Microsoft Windows.

games.title: Gran Turismo Sport
games.description: Gran Turismo Sport is a 2017 racing video game developed by Polyphony Digital and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment for PlayStation 4.

name: Puzzle
description: Puzzle games are games that require puzzle solving.

games.title: Portal 2
games.description: Portal 2 is a 2011 first-person puzzle-platform video game developed and published by Valve.

games.title: Tetris
games.description: Tetris is a tile-matching puzzle video game originally designed and programmed by Soviet Russian software engineer Alexey Pajitnov.
